tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    ticket_description TEXT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
    support_agent_id INT,
    priority_level INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    priority ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
    status ENUM('Open', 'In Progress', 'Closed'),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE agents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    availability ENUM('Available', 'Busy', 'Offline'),
    experience_years INT,
    specialization VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    ticket_description VARCHAR(255),
    open_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    close_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportAgents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TicketResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    response_message TEXT,
    response_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    ticket_category VARCHAR(50),
    ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
    ticket_open_date DATE,
    ticket_close_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_support_tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
  ticket_opened_at TIMESTAMP,
  ticket_closed_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_email VARCHAR(50),
  customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE agents (
  agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_name VARCHAR(50),
  agent_email VARCHAR(50),
  agent_department VARCHAR(30)
)

CREATE TABLE ticket_responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE response_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_id INT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
)
